title: MacBook Pro: SD Card slot could be coming back
content:
The MacBook Pro is Apple’s top-of-the-line laptop. It offers top-notch performance for demanding users who need processing power and are willing to spend top dollar for it. Learn more about the MacBook Pro by reading about its main features below.

Editor’s note: Updated 1/22/21 with a report that the SD Card slot could make a comeback.

The latest: SD Card slot returns, but no Face ID

In a January report about a smaller MacBook Air, Bloomberg reported that Apple could outfit the next MacBook Pro with an SD Card slot. The SD Card slot was removed from the MacBook Pro in 2016. In the same report, Bloomberg stated that Apple is working on Macs with cellular connectivity and Face ID, but those features will not be ready soon.

To read this article in full, please click here
author: Roman Loyola
